thread.title: MarkleyB

author: MarkleyB
title: MarkleyB
text: I have been shopping online at B&H for a number of years. I have purchased both used and new products and have never had any issues with the purchase, delivery or performance of those products. I love shopping at B&H because their website provide the right kind of information to help shoppers to make their decision before purchasing. This includes detailed product information, customer reviews, questions and answers and applicable accessories. With B&H I can shop with confidence, knowing my purchase will meet or exceed my expectations. I happily recommend B&H to all my friends
